description: You are in the starting room. There are exits to the up, northwest, and east. A small caramel coloured dog with a waggy tail is here.

movableObjects.name: Rusty Sword
movableObjects.description: A rusty old sword, not very sharp but better than nothing.

movableObjects.name: Healing Potion
movableObjects.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that heals wounds.

smells: The air smells fresh and clean.
